name: Undivided Heart
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Ganyu, equip this card. After Ganyu equips this card, immediately use Frostflake Arrow once. When your Ganyu, who has this card equipped, uses Frostflake Arrow: Cryo DMG dealt by this Skill +1 if this Skill has been used before during this match, and it now deals 3 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby instead. (You must have Ganyu in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Shaken, Not Purred
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Diona, equip this card. After Diona equips this card, immediately use Icy Paws once. When your Diona, who has this card equipped, creates a Cat-Claw Shield, its Shield points +1. (You must have Diona in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Cold-Blooded Strike
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Kaeya, equip this card. After Kaeya equips this card, immediately use Frostgnaw once. After your Kaeya, who has this card equipped, uses Frostgnaw, he heals himself for 2 HP. (Once per Round) (You must have Kaeya in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Steady Breathing
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Chongyun, equip this card. After Chongyun equips this card, immediately use Chonghua's Layered Frost once. When your Chongyun, who has this card equipped, creates a Chonghua Frost Field, it will have the following effects: Starting Duration (Rounds) +1, will cause your Sword, Claymore, and Polearm-wielding characters' Normal Attacks to deal +1 DMG. (You must have Chongyun in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Kanten Senmyou Blessing
content: The Cryo Elemental Infusion created by your Kamisato Ayaka, who has this card equipped, allows the character to which it is attached to deal +1 Cryo DMG.\nWhen you switch to Kamisato Ayaka, who has this card equipped: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)\n(You must have Kamisato Ayaka in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Glorious Season
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Barbara, equip this card. After Barbara equips this card, immediately use Let the Show Begin♪ once. When your Barbara, who has this card equipped, is on the field, Melody Loop will allow you to spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you use "Switch Character." (Once per round) (You must have Barbara in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: The Scent Remained
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Xingqiu, equip this card. After Xingqiu equips this card, immediately use Fatal Rainscreen once. When your Xingqiu, who has this card equipped, creates a Rain Sword, its starting Usage(s) +1. (You must have Xingqiu in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Prophecy of Submersion
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Mona, equip this card. When Mona equips this card, immediately use Stellaris Phantasm once. When your Mona, who has this card equipped, is the active character, the Hydro-Related Reactions you trigger deal +2 additional DMG. (You must have Mona in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Flowing Flame
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Diluc, equip this card. After Diluc equips this card, immediately use Searing Onslaught once. When your Diluc, who has this card equipped, uses Searing Onslaught for the second time in one Round, spend 1 less Pyro Die. (You must have Diluc in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Crossfire
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Xiangling, equip this card. After Xiangling equips this card, immediately use Guoba Attack once. When your Xiangling, who has this card equipped, uses Guoba Attack, she will also deal 1 Pyro DMG. (You must have Xiangling in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Grand Expectation
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Bennett, equip this card. After Bennett equips this card, immediately use Fantastic Voyage once. When your Bennett, who has this card equipped, creates an Inspiration Field, its DMG Bonus is now always active and will no longer have an HP restriction. (You must have Bennett in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Naganohara Meteor Swarm
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Yoimiya, equip this card. After Yoimiya equips this card, immediately use Niwabi Fire-Dance once. After your Yoimiya, who has this card equipped, triggers Niwabi Enshou: Deal 1 additional Pyro DMG. (You must have Yoimiya in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Stellar Predator
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Fischl, equip this card. After Fischl equips this card, immediately use Nightrider once. When your Fischl, who has this card equipped, creates an Oz, and after Fischl uses a Normal Attack: Deal 2 Electro DMG. (Consumes Usage(s)) (You must have Fischl in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Awakening
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Razor, equip this card. After Razor equips this card, immediately use Claw and Thunder once. After your Razor, who has this card equipped, uses Claw and Thunder: 1 of your Electro characters gains 1 Energy. (Active Character prioritized) (You must have Razor in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Thundering Penance
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Keqing, equip this card. After Keqing equips this card, immediately use Stellar Restoration once. When your Keqing, who has this card equipped, creates an Electro Elemental Infusion, it will have the following effects: Starting Duration (Rounds) +1, Electro DMG dealt by the attached character +1. (You must have Keqing in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Featherfall Judgment
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Cyno, equip this card. After Cyno equips this card, immediately use Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer once. When your Cyno, who has this card equipped, uses Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer with 3 or 5 levels of Pactsworn Pathclearer's Indwelling effect, deal +1 additional DMG. (You must have Cyno in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Chaotic Entropy
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Sucrose, equip this card. After Sucrose equips this card, immediately use Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II once. After the Large Wind Spirit created by your Sucrose, who had this card equipped, has converted to another Elemental Type: Deal +1 DMG of this Elemental Type. (You must have Sucrose in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Lands of Dandelion
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Jean, equip this card. After Jean equips this card, immediately use Dandelion Breeze once. When your Jean, who has this card equipped, is on the field, Dandelion Field will cause you to deal +1 Anemo DMG. (You must have Jean in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Strategic Reserve
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Ningguang, equip this card. After Ningguang equips this card, immediately use Jade Screen once. When your Ningguang, who has this card equipped, is on the field, Jade Screen will cause you to deal +1 Geo DMG. (You must have Ningguang in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: I Got Your Back
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Noelle, equip this card. After Noelle equips this card, immediately use Breastplate once. When your Noelle, who has this card equipped, creates a Full Plate, it will heal all your characters for 1 HP after Noelle uses a Normal Attack. (Once per Round) (You must have Noelle in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Floral Sidewinder
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Collei, equip this card. After Collei equips this card, immediately use Floral Brush once. After your Collei, who has this card equipped, uses Floral Brush, during this Round, when your characters' Skills trigger Dendro-Related Reactions: Deal 1 Dendro DMG. (Once per Round) (You must have Collei in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Streaming Surge
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Rhodeia of Loch, equip this card. After Rhodeia of Loch equips this card, immediately use Tide and Torrent once. When your Rhodeia of Loch, who has this card equipped, uses Tide and Torrent, all of your Summon(s) gain +1 Usage(s). (You must have Rhodeia of Loch in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Mirror Cage
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Mirror Maiden, equip this card. After Mirror Maiden equips this card, immediately use Influx Blast once. When your Mirror Maiden, who has this card equipped, creates a Refraction, it will have the following effects: Starting Duration (Rounds) +1, will increase the Elemental Dice Cost of switching from the character to which this is attached to another character by 1. (You must have Mirror Maiden in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Paid in Full
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Fatui Pyro Agent, equip this card. After Fatui Pyro Agent equips this card, immediately use Prowl once. When your Fatui Pyro Agent, who has this card equipped, creates a Stealth, it will have the following effects: Starting Usage(s) +1, the Physical DMG the attached character deals will be converted to Pyro DMG. (You must have Fatui Pyro Agent in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Transcendent Automaton
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Maguu Kenki, equip this card. After Maguu Kenki equips this card, immediately use Blustering Blade once. After your Maguu Kenki, who has this card equipped, uses Blustering Blade, you will switch to your next character. You will switch to your previous character when your Maguu Kenki, who has this card equipped, uses Frosty Assault. (You must have Maguu Kenki in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Stonehide Reforged
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Stonehide Lawachurl, equip this card. After Stonehide Lawachurl equips this card, immediately use Upa Shato once. When your Stonehide Lawachurl, who has this card equipped, defeats an opposing character: Stonehide Lawachurl will re-attach Stonehide and Stone Force. (You must have Stonehide Lawachurl in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Proliferating Spores
content: Combat Action: When your active character is Jadeplume Terrorshroom, equip this card. After Jadeplume Terrorshroom equips this card, immediately use Volatile Spore Cloud once. Your Jadeplume Terrorshroom, who has this card equipped, can accumulate 1 more stack of Radical Vitality. (You must have Jadeplume Terrorshroom in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Magic Guide
content: The character deals +1 DMG.\n(Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)

name: Sacrificial Fragments
content: The character deals +1 DMG.\nAfter the character uses an Elemental Skill: Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Elemental Type as this character. (Once per Round)\n(Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)

name: Skyward Atlas

name: Lithic Spear

name: Skyward Spine

name: Aquila Favonia
content: The character deals +1 DMG.\nAfter the opposing character uses a Skill: If the character with this attached is the active character, heal this character for 1 HP. (Max twice per Round)\n(Only Sword Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)

name: Adventurer's Bandana
content: After a character uses a Normal Attack: Heal self for 1 HP. (Max 3 times per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

name: Lucky Dog's Silver Circlet
content: After the character uses an Elemental Skill: Heal self for 2 HP. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

name: Traveling Doctor's Handkerchief
content: After a character uses an Elemental Burst: Heal all your characters for 1 HP. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

name: Gambler's Earrings
content: After an opposing character is defeated: If the character this card is attached to is the active character, create Omni Element ×2.\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

name: Instructor's Cap
content: After a character triggers an Elemental Reaction: Create 1 Elemental Die that matches this Character's Elemental Type. (Max 3 times per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

name: Exile's Circlet
content: After a character uses an Elemental Burst: All your characters on standby gain 1 Energy. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

name: Broken Rime's Echo
content: When a character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Cryo Die. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

name: Liyue Harbor Wharf
content: End Phase: Draw 2 cards.\nUsage(s): 2

name: Knights of Favonius Library
content: When played: Select any Elemental Dice to reroll.\nRoll Phase: Gain another chance to reroll.

name: Jade Chamber
content: Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to match the Elemental Type of your active character.

name: Dawn Winery
content: When you perform "Switch Character": Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

name: Wangshu Inn
content: End Phase: Heal the most injured character on standby for 2 HP.\nUsage(s): 2

name: Favonius Cathedral
content: End Phase: Heal your active character for 2 HP.\nUsage(s): 2

name: Paimon
content: When Action Phase begins: Create Omni Element ×2.\nUsage(s): 2

name: Katheryne
content: When you perform "Switch Character": This switch is considered a Fast Action instead of a Combat Action. (Once per Round)

name: Timaeus
content: Comes with 2 Transmutation Materials when played.\nEnd Phase: Gain 1 Transmutation Material.\nWhen playing an Artifact Card: If possible, spend Transmutation Materials equal to the total cost of the Artifact and equip this Artifact for free. (Once per Round)

name: Wagner
content: Comes with 2 Forging Billets when played.\nEnd Phase: Gain 1 Forging Billet.\nWhen playing a Weapon Card: If possible, spend Forging Billets equal to the total cost of the Weapon and equip this Weapon for free. (Once per Round)

name: Chef Mao
content: After playing a Food Event Card: Create 1 random Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

name: Tubby
content: When playing a Location Support Card: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)

name: Timmie
content: Triggers automatically once per Round: This card gains 1 Pigeon.\nWhen this card gains 3 Pigeons, discard this card, then draw 1 card and create Omni Element ×1.

name: Liben
content: End Phase: Collect your unused Elemental Dice (Max 1 of each Elemental Type).\nWhen Action Phase begins: If this card has collected 3 Elemental Dice, draw 2 cards and create Omni Element ×2, then discard this card.

name: Chang the Ninth
content: When either side uses a Skill: If Physical DMG or Piercing DMG was dealt, or an Elemental Reaction was triggered, this card gains 1 Inspiration.\nWhen this card gains 3 Inspiration, discard this card, then draw 2 cards.

name: Ellin
content: When you use a Skill that has already been used in this Round: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

name: Iron Tongue Tian
content: End Phase: One of your characters without maximum Energy gains 1 Energy. (Active Character prioritized)\nUsage(s): 2

name: Liu Su
content: After you switch characters: If the character you switched to does not have Energy, they will gain 1 Energy. (Once per Round)\nUsage(s): 2

name: Parametric Transformer
content: When either side uses a Skill: If Elemental DMG was dealt, this card gains 1 Qualitative Progress.\nWhen this card gains 3 Qualitative Progress, discard this card, then create 3 different Basic Elemental Dice.

name: NRE
content: When played: Draw 1 Food Event Card from your deck.\nWhen you play a Food Event Card: Draw 1 Food Event Card from your deck. (Once per Round)

name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Ice
content: Create 1 Cryo Die.\n(You must have at least 2 Cryo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Shattering Ice
content: During this Round, your current active character will deal +2 DMG for the next instance.\n(You must have at least 2 Cryo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Waters
content: Create 1 Hydro Die.\n(You must have at least 2 Hydro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Soothing Water
content: Heal your active character for 2 HP and all your characters on standby for 1 HP.\n(You must have at least 2 Hydro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Flames
content: Create 1 Pyro Die.\n(You must have at least 2 Pyro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Fervent Flames
content: During this round, the next instance of Pyro-Related Reactions your current active character triggers deals +3 DMG.\n(You must have at least 2 Pyro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Thunder
content: Create 1 Electro Die.\n(You must have at least 2 Electro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: High Voltage
content: One of your characters without maximum Energy gains 1 Energy. (Active Character prioritized)\n(You must have at least 2 Electro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Winds
content: Create 1 Anemo Die.\n(You must have at least 2 Anemo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Impetuous Winds
content: Switch to the target character and create Omni Element ×1.\n(You must have at least 2 Anemo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Stone
content: Create 1 Geo Die.\n(You must have at least 2 Geo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Enduring Rock
content: During this round, after your character deals Geo DMG next time: Should there be any Combat Status on your side that provides Shield, grant one such Status with 3 Shield points. \n(You must have at least 2 Geo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Weeds
content: Create 1 Dendro Die.\n(You must have at least 2 Dendro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Elemental Resonance: Sprawling Greenery
content: During this round, the next Elemental Reaction your active character triggers deals +2 DMG.\nYour Burning Flame, Dendro Core, and Catalyzing Field gain +1 Usage(s).\n(You must have at least 2 Dendro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: The Bestest Travel Companion!
content: Convert the Elemental Dice spent to Omni Element ×2.

name: Changing Shifts
content: The next time you perform "Switch Character": Spend 1 less Elemental Die.

name: Toss-Up
content: Select any Elemental Die to reroll. Can reroll 2 times.

name: Strategize
content: Draw 2 cards.

name: I Haven't Lost Yet!
content: Only playable if one of your characters is defeated this Round:\nCreate Omni Element ×1 and your current active character gains 1 Energy.

name: Leave It to Me!
content: The next time you perform "Switch Character": This switch will be considered a Fast Action instead of a Combat Action.

name: When the Crane Returned
content: The next time you use a Skill: Switch your next character in to be the active character.

name: Starsigns
content: Your current Active Character gains 1 Energy.

name: Calx's Arts
content: Shift 1 Energy from at most 2 of your characters on standby to your active character.

name: Master of Weaponry
content: Shift 1 Weapon Equipment Card that has been equipped to one of your characters to another one of your characters of the same Weapon Type.

name: Blessing of the Divine Relic's Installation
content: Shift 1 Artifact Equipment Card that has been equipped to one of your characters to another one of your characters.

name: Quick Knit
content: Choose one Summon on your side and grant it +1 Usage(s).

name: Send Off
content: Choose one Summon on the opposing side and destroy it.

name: Guardian's Oath
content: Destroy all Summons. (Affects both you and your opponent!)

name: Abyssal Summons
content: Summon 1 Random Hilichurl Summon!\n(You must have at least 2 Monster characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

name: Jueyun Guoba
content: During this Round, the target character's next Normal Attack deals +1 DMG.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

name: Adeptus' Temptation
content: During this Round, the target character's next Elemental Burst deals +3 DMG.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

name: Lotus Flower Crisp
content: During this Round, the target character takes -3 DMG the next time.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

name: Northern Smoked Chicken
content: During this Round, the target character's next Normal Attack costs 1 less Unaligned Element.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

name: Sweet Madame
content: Heal the target character for 1 HP.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

name: Mondstadt Hash Brown
content: Heal the target character for 2 HP.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

name: Mushroom Pizza
content: Heal the target character for 1 HP. For the next two Rounds, heal this character for 1 HP again at the End Phase.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

name: Minty Meat Rolls
content: Before this Round ends, the target character's Normal Attacks cost 1 less Unaligned Element.\n(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)
